column5: The daughter finally gave birth on Friday afternoon at 3:17 in the afternoon. We now welcome A 9lb 5oz bundle of joy to our little clan. Little Savannah ( smaller than the 11lb estimate) is a cutie and already has a full head of hair. Next addition is due in November.
Agguri Nono.
Auguri nonno again. I have 8 all under six! A box of marbles when they are all  and they are coming over today

I wouldn't exactly say 'little" Savannah.  lol  Congratulations Bruce.  And I'm sure we'll start seeing more than just pictures of the fish you catch on the message board in the upcoming days.  I just became a Grandpa myself about 6 weeks ago.  Pretty awesome.

Auguri nonno again. I have 8 all under six!   Wow! Even beats us with 7 all under 8! Lots of fun. As someone said"If we knew grandkids were this much fun we would have had them first"!!  Congrats, big. I'm sure you will enjoy!
Congrats Grandpa
That's great news!
Right on Bruce, congrats to all. Let the fun begin.
Congratulations. Best of health to all
Congratulations Bruce and all the best to your entire family.
Congrats to you and all of your family Bruce.
I need a spelling lesson.
Congrats Bruce as well. think I'll be waiting for sometime still lol.
Congrats!!!
Gonna have to find a bigger house!!! Need room for all the grandkids fishing trophies and mounts.
Congratulations Bruce and to your entire family
Congrats Bruce
congrats
Awesome!  Another fishing partner!  We also have a braqnd new one born Mar 1.  I'm sur you'll enjoy

Thanks for all the kindness gang.  Yup, Grampa is happier than a pig in ----  LOL!  Have not had the chance to have Savannah in my arms yet.  Don't want to wake her up.  Im just sitting here enjoying a warm fuzzy while knocking back a few.
Congrats Bruce...  I'd like to add a pic of our fifth or sixth ??? great-grandchild...BENJAMIN:

Just noticed this Bruce. Congratulations. Being a Grandparent is the best of both worlds. You can enjoy them when they are good and send them home with mom and dad when there not so good   I'm sure you'll have her enjoying the outdoors and fishing in no time.
